body.p: Some commentators suggested that IASC should begin a wider review of IAS 20 as a matter of urgency. In early 2000, the G4+1 group of standard setters published a Discussion Paper Accounting by Recipients for Non‑Reciprocal Transfers, Excluding Contributions by Owners: Their Definition, Recognition and Measurement. The Board’s work plan does not currently include a project on the accounting for government grants or other forms of non‑reciprocal transfer.
